recommendations.title: Low-Impact Energy Boost
recommendations.description: Perfect for day 15 of your cycle

yoga.title: Morning Yoga Flow
yoga.description: A gentle yoga flow to start your day with energy and focus

exercises.name: Sun Salutation
exercises.description: A flowing sequence of movements coordinated with breath
exercises.tips: Move with your breath, inhale on upward movements, exhale on downward movements.

exercises.name: Warrior I
exercises.description: A standing pose that strengthens the legs and opens the hips and chest
exercises.tips: Keep your front knee aligned with your ankle, not beyond your toes.

exercises.name: Downward Dog
exercises.description: An inversion pose that stretches the hamstrings and strengthens the arms
exercises.tips: Press your heels toward the floor and lift your hips high.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.description: A resting pose that gently stretches the lower back and hips
exercises.tips: Breathe deeply and relax your shoulders away from your ears.

yoga.title: Relaxing Stretch
yoga.description: A gentle stretching routine to release tension and improve flexibility

exercises.name: Seated Forward Bend
exercises.description: A seated pose that stretches the hamstrings and lower back
exercises.tips: Bend from the hips, not the waist, and keep your spine long.

exercises.name: Butterfly Stretch
exercises.description: A seated pose that opens the hips and stretches the inner thighs
exercises.tips: Gently press your knees down with your elbows, but don't force them.

exercises.name: Supine Twist
exercises.description: A lying pose that twists the spine and releases tension
exercises.tips: Keep both shoulders on the ground as you twist.

exercises.name: Corpse Pose
exercises.description: A relaxation pose that calms the mind and body
exercises.tips: Let your body be heavy and completely relax into the floor.

hiit.title: Quick Burn HIIT
hiit.description: A high-intensity interval training workout to maximize calorie burn

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Stand with your feet together and arms at your sides, then jump up with your feet apart and hands overhead.
exercises.tips: Keep your knees slightly bent to reduce impact.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Start in a plank position and alternate bringing each knee toward your chest in a running motion.
exercises.tips: Keep your hips level and move at a controlled pace.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: Begin in a standing position, drop into a squat, kick your feet back into a plank, return to squat, and jump up.
exercises.tips: Modify by stepping back instead of jumping if needed.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Run in place, lifting your knees as high as possible with each step.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and pump your arms for added intensity.

hiit.title: Tabata Challenge
hiit.description: A Tabata-style workout with intense intervals for maximum results

exercises.name: Squat Jumps
exercises.description: Perform a squat, then explosively jump up, landing softly back into the squat position.
exercises.tips: Land with soft knees to protect your joints.

exercises.name: Push-up Jacks
exercises.description: Perform a push-up, then jump your feet out and in like a jumping jack.
exercises.tips: Modify on your knees if needed, but still perform the jack motion with your feet.

exercises.name: Plank Shoulder Taps
exercises.description: In a plank position, alternately tap each shoulder with the opposite hand.
exercises.tips: Keep your hips stable and avoid rocking from side to side.

exercises.name: Speed Skaters
exercises.description: Jump laterally from one foot to the other, mimicking a speed skating motion.
exercises.tips: Reach your hand toward the opposite foot for added balance and stretch.

strength.title: Core Strength
strength.description: A focused workout to strengthen your core muscles

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: Lie on your back with knees bent, hands behind your head, and lift your shoulders off the ground.
exercises.tips: Focus on the contraction of your abs, not pulling on your neck.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold a push-up position with your body in a straight line from head to heels.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and keep your hips from sagging.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Sit with knees bent, feet lifted, and twist your torso from side to side.
exercises.tips: Keep your back straight and twist from your waist.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lie on your back and lift your legs up and down without touching the floor.
exercises.tips: Press your lower back into the floor to protect your spine.

strength.title: Full Body Tone
strength.description: A comprehensive workout targeting all major muscle groups

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back, then return to standing.
exercises.tips: Keep your weight in your heels and chest up.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor, then push back up.
exercises.tips: Modify by doing push-ups on your knees if needed.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward with one leg, lowering your hips until both knees are bent at about a 90-degree angle.
exercises.tips: Keep your front knee aligned with your ankle, not beyond your toes.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows
exercises.description: Bend at the waist with a flat back, holding a weight in one hand, and pull it up toward your hip.
exercises.tips: Keep your back flat and pull your elbow straight back.

pre-pregnancy.title: Pelvic Floor Strength
pre-pregnancy.description: Exercises to strengthen your pelvic floor muscles

exercises.name: Kegels
exercises.description: Contract your pelvic floor muscles, hold, and release.
exercises.tips: Imagine stopping the flow of urine to identify the correct muscles.

exercises.name: Bridge
exercises.description: Lie on your back with knees bent, lift your hips off the ground, and hold.
exercises.tips: Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back, then return to standing.
exercises.tips: Focus on engaging your pelvic floor as you rise.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.description: On hands and knees, extend opposite arm and leg while maintaining a stable core.
exercises.tips: Keep your back flat and hips level throughout the movement.

pre-pregnancy.title: Gentle Cardio
pre-pregnancy.description: Low-impact cardio exercises safe for pre-pregnancy

exercises.name: Marching in Place
exercises.description: Lift your knees up and down while staying in place.
exercises.tips: Maintain good posture and engage your core.

exercises.name: Side Steps
exercises.description: Step side to side, tapping your toe between steps.
exercises.tips: Keep a slight bend in your knees throughout.

exercises.name: Modified Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Step one foot out at a time while raising arms, instead of jumping.
exercises.tips: Focus on the arm movement to increase heart rate.

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.description: Extend arms to the sides and make small, then large circles.
exercises.tips: Keep your shoulders relaxed away from your ears.

post-pregnancy.title: Postpartum Recovery
post-pregnancy.description: Gentle exercises to help recover after pregnancy

exercises.name: Pelvic Tilts
exercises.description: Lie on your back with knees bent, tilt your pelvis to flatten your lower back against the floor.
exercises.tips: Focus on engaging your deep abdominal muscles.

exercises.name: Heel Slides
exercises.description: Lie on your back with knees bent, slide one heel away from you until leg is straight, then return.
exercises.tips: Keep your pelvis stable throughout the movement.

exercises.name: Modified Side Plank
exercises.description: Lie on your side with knees bent, prop up on your elbow, and lift your hips.
exercises.tips: Start with short holds and gradually increase duration.

exercises.name: Seated Twist
exercises.description: Sit with legs crossed, place hands on knees, and gently twist from the waist.
exercises.tips: Breathe deeply as you twist, exhaling into the rotation.

post-pregnancy.title: Mommy & Baby
post-pregnancy.description: Exercises you can do with your baby

exercises.name: Baby Lift
exercises.description: Hold baby securely and lift them up and down like a weight.
exercises.tips: Keep your back straight and use your legs to support the movement.

exercises.name: Stroller Lunges
exercises.description: Hold onto a stroller for support and perform lunges.
exercises.tips: Ensure the stroller is locked or stable before beginning.

exercises.name: Baby-Weighted Squats
exercises.description: Hold baby close to your chest and perform gentle squats.
exercises.tips: Keep your weight in your heels and back straight.

exercises.name: Plank with Baby
exercises.description: Get into a plank position with baby lying underneath you, making eye contact.
exercises.tips: Sing or talk to baby to keep them engaged during the exercise.

others.title: Stress Relief
others.description: Exercises designed to reduce stress and promote relaxation

exercises.name: Deep Breathing
exercises.description: Sit comfortably and take slow, deep breaths, focusing on your breath.
exercises.tips: Inhale through your nose for 4 counts, hold for 2, exhale for 6.

exercises.name: Neck Rolls
exercises.description: Gently roll your head in a circular motion to release tension.
exercises.tips: Move slowly and stop if you feel any pain.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.description: Kneel and sit back on your heels, extending arms forward and resting your forehead on the mat.
exercises.tips: Breathe deeply and feel the stretch in your back.

exercises.name: Seated Forward Bend
exercises.description: Sit with legs extended, hinge at the hips, and reach toward your feet.
exercises.tips: Focus on lengthening your spine rather than touching your toes.

others.title: Office Break
others.description: Quick exercises you can do at your desk or in an office

exercises.name: Seated Twist
exercises.description: Sit tall in your chair, place one hand on the opposite knee, and twist gently.
exercises.tips: Initiate the twist from your core, not your shoulders.

exercises.name: Desk Push-ups
exercises.description: Place hands on the edge of your desk and perform push-ups at an angle.
exercises.tips: Ensure your desk is stable before beginning.

exercises.name: Chair Squats
exercises.description: Stand up from your chair and sit back down without fully resting.
exercises.tips: Use a chair with no wheels and keep your weight in your heels.

exercises.name: Seated Leg Raises
exercises.description: While seated, extend one leg until straight, hold, then lower.
exercises.tips: Engage your core to support your lower back.

achievements.title: 5-Day Streak
achievements.description: Completed workouts 5 days in a row
